recommendations.title: 25% DISCOUNTS for the first examination
recommendations.text: Regular physical exams, STD screenings, testicular self-exams

recommendations.title: 5% DISCOUNTS for the first examination
recommendations.text: Regular cholesterol and blood pressure checks, eye exams for vision health, prostate health check

recommendations.title: 15% DISCOUNTS for the first examination
recommendations.text: Regular cardiovascular assessments, diabetes screening, bone density tests
